titleStmt.title: Description of Two works on alchemy, in Arabic in Hebrew characters.

notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Two works on alchemy, in Arabic in Hebrew characters.

msItem.title: al-Mā’ al-waraqī wa-al-arḍ al-najmīyah אלמא אלורקי ואלארץ אלנג'מיה

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental semi-cursive script of the 17th century.

decoDesc.decoNote: 3v An illustration of winged creatures, in red and black ink.
4r An illustration of winged creatures, in red and black ink.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Al-Ma Al-Waraki and Tuhpah Al-Tadbir. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 64.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: A. C. Reichardt: purchased from him by the British Museum on 08 June 1867: inscribed, folio [44v] (fse001v).
